## MiddlewareContext

<GenerationInfo sourceFile="packages/commandkit/src/app/commands/Context.ts" sourceLine="569" packageName="commandkit" />

Extended context class for middleware execution with additional control methods.

```ts title="Signature"
class MiddlewareContext<T extends CommandExecutionMode = CommandExecutionMode> extends Context<T, MiddlewareContextArgs> {
    setCommandRunner(fn: RunCommand) => void;
}
```
* Extends: <code><a href='/docs/api-reference/commandkit/classes/context#context'>Context</a>&#60;T, <a href='/docs/api-reference/commandkit/interfaces/middleware-context-args#middlewarecontextargs'>MiddlewareContextArgs</a>&#62;</code>



<div className="members-wrapper">

### setCommandRunner

<MemberInfo kind="method" type={`(fn: <a href='/docs/api-reference/commandkit/types/run-command#runcommand'>RunCommand</a>) => void`}   />

Sets command runner function to wrap the command execution.



*Example*

```ts
ctx.setCommandRunner(async (execute) => {
// do something before command execution
await execute();
// do something after command execution
})
```


</div>
